quote: My heart pounded annoyingly in my ears, and it was getting harder to stay focused. I'd almost gotten trapped in here, and now I'd come back. Sometimes I did have truly terrible ideas.
quote_letters: MY HEART POUNDED ANNOYINGLY IN MY EARS AND IT WAS GETTING HARDER TO STAY FOCUSED ID ALMOST GOTTEN TRAPPED IN HERE AND NOW ID COME BACK SOMETIMES I DID HAVE TRULY TERRIBLE IDEAS
